page.title: 20Finale
page.content:
And now our Domesday work is done, Some's meant work and some been fun, So people living in future ages, Can read of us in these few pages.
The contributors to the writing are the class of S5, Severnbanks School, Lydney; especially:
Sara Yeates Hannah Collins Darren Smith Richard Hyatt Richard Fowler Linden Powell Joanne Shockey Tanya Haddock Andrew Wintle Heidi Burnett Sharon Allen Richard Hughes Christian Price Andrew Nelmes
and Emma Biddle from Class S1 directed by their teachers Mr. M.G. Thomas and Mrs. M. Hibbert
